summary: Successfully tested all 4 updated features in MOZTEC Money Changer. All features are working correctly: 1) Quick Customer form now includes Gender (Jenis Kelamin) and Address (Alamat) fields, 2) Transaction type dropdown simplified to show only 'Jual' and 'Beli', 3) Dashboard displays company name from settings API, 4) New transaction number format TRX-MBA-J/B-XXXXX-XXX-DDMMYY is implemented and working.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for transaction creation

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with admin@moztec.com / admin123 successful
Backend: Customer creation with gender and address fields working
Backend: Gender field accepts 'L' and 'P' values correctly
Backend: Address field (domicile_address) saves correctly
Backend: Transaction number generation with new format TRX-MBA-J/B-XXXXX-XXX-DDMMYY
Backend: Jual transactions get 'J' indicator in transaction number
Backend: Beli transactions get 'B' indicator in transaction number
Backend: Company settings GET/PUT operations working
Backend: Company name update and retrieval working
Backend: All existing endpoints still functional (26/26 tests passed)
Frontend: Login flow working correctly
Frontend: Dashboard displays company name from settings (MOZTEC Money Changer)
Frontend: Navigation to Transactions page working
Frontend: Transaction creation dialog opens correctly
Frontend: Quick Customer dialog accessible via '+' button
Frontend: Gender field (Jenis Kelamin) present with L/P dropdown options
Frontend: Address field (Alamat) present and functional
Frontend: Address field accepts text input correctly
Frontend: Transaction type dropdown shows only 'Jual' and 'Beli' options
Frontend: Transaction type dropdown simplified (no extra text)
Frontend: Transaction numbers display new format in transaction list
Frontend: New format visible: TRX-MBA-B-00007-HQ-191225, TRX-MBA-J-00006-HQ-191225
Frontend: Transaction numbers correctly show J for Jual, B for Beli
Frontend: All 4 requested features fully implemented and working
